name: The European Plastic Pipes and Fittings Association
memberOrga: See association website with links to the members: www.teppfa.eu
goal:
• TEPPFA promotes the benefits of plastic pipe systems through robust factual data and represents the interests of the European plastic pipes and fittings sector at EU policymaker level.

• TEPPFA promotes the contribution of plastic pipes to achieving some of the key UN Sustainable Development Goals.

• TEPPFA raises awareness among its members and takes action to increase the uptake of recycled content into new plastic pipes and fittings.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Construction Products Regulation
Circular Economy
Waste Frame Directive
Drinking Water Directive
Product Environmental Footprint
Harmonised Standards
REACH
